meanings.definition: The quality or state of being small in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The littleness of the toy car amazed the children.
meanings.sent2: The littleness of the kitten made it adorable.
meanings.sent3: The littleness of the cupcake was almost too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, the littleness of the firefly's light seemed magical.
meanings.sent5: The littleness of the pebble in the giant's hand was astonishing.

meanings.definition: The act of making something smaller in size or extent.
meanings.sent1: The littleness of the reduction surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The littleness of the sculptor's chisel was precise.
meanings.sent3: The littleness of the shrinking potion caused unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: With each cut, the littleness of the paper increased.
meanings.sent5: The littleness of the artist's brush strokes added intricate details.
